Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2015 12:35PM Clarasophia1 wrote: Actually no, not planning on it anytime soon. Look up alternate treatments. Try Dirt Cheap Protocol. They're are all sorts of options. Remember, cancer is big business. Like I'm telling you anything!!! These costs are ridiculous. Please be informed and don't give up so easily. Sorry for your situation, been there. Need I say more?? Your life is worth living, step outside the box and be educated:
Posts.Title: What is it like to die of breast cancer? EbonyEyes Moderators
